short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giving you a break from movie spoilers, one KitKat at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need a break from spoilers?
Spoiler Break has you (and the spoilers, literally) covered!

Scroll the internet without worry with the help of Spoiler Break. With just a few clicks, Spoiler Break censors any specific keywords of your choice with KitKat bars. No spoiler will dare ruin the movies and shows you want to see!

What it does:
Censors spoilers words, hashtags, links, images, thumbnails, etc.

Where it works:
•⁠ ⁠Social media (X or Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, etc.)
•⁠ ⁠Search engines
•⁠ ⁠News articles
•⁠  ⁠And many more
